title: Interview Prep Discord Bot
subtitle: Automated Mock Interview Platform
highlights: Engineered fully automated mock-interview workflow matching students, provisioning private voice channels, and logging session metadata, enabling 100% autonomous interview cycles
Built ETL pipelines processing 300 internship/new-grad roles monthly using webhook triggers and JSON validation, delivering opportunities to 30+ active students
Organized rubric-based evaluation data with FAANG-standard scoring, improving consistency and creating ML-ready datasets for future performance prediction
Implemented logging, error handling, and automated tests ensuring uninterrupted data flow and reliable user experience for long-term scalability

title: CNCT
subtitle: Campus Social Platform
highlights: Designed normalized Supabase/PostgreSQL models for users, posts, and buildings, enforcing relational integrity with entity-relationship modeling for scalable data management
Optimized multi-join feed and discovery queries with indexed lookups and hash/merge join algorithms, reducing latency by 10 seconds under high load
Implemented image storage with Supabase S3 buckets and automated moderation for secure, compliant media handling across platform
Built ETL workflows integrating campus buildings and events with schema validation, laying foundation for ML-based recommendations

title: Pet Your Rabbit
subtitle: Virtual Pet Care & Progression Game
highlights: Developed cozy virtual pet game with touch interactions, petting physics, happiness/energy systems, and progression mechanics across 3-person Agile team
Built backend authentication system, global leaderboard, and cloud save functionality syncing user data and high scores in real-time
Implemented upgrade system with passive pets-per-minute generation and dynamic pricing curves that scale with ownership levels
Designed inventory management and cosmetic store with SwiftUI, featuring item effects on rabbit mood and customizable appearance options
Created engaging gameplay loop combining clicker mechanics with virtual pet care, encouraging consistency and emotional engagement

title: MirAI
subtitle: Scalable Plant Monitoring App
highlights: Developed full-stack plant monitoring app supporting 1,000+ users with React frontend, Node.js/Express backend, and Supabase authentication (CRUD, RLS, OAuth, password reset)
Managed 5,000+ plant entries with responsive UI and integrated endpoints for health, identification, and growth tracking
Achieved 93% top suggestion and 98% within top 3 plant ID accuracy during 3-day hackathon
Validated via Faker.js test data and automated load scripts

title: EcoQuest
subtitle: AI Educational Platform
highlights: Directed 4-person team to deliver full-stack AI educational platform in 3 days, coordinating analytics-driven gameplay features and Agile sprints for rapid prototype delivery
Implemented REST APIs for adaptive quest logic and daily-changing biosystem data, enabling structured retrieval and visualization for 1,400 simulated players
Leveraged Google ADK and Gemini APIs to automatically generate quests and fun facts, reducing manual content updates while maintaining high educational value
Optimized JSON processing and API response times by 20 seconds, improving real-time gameplay performance and supporting scalable data flows for ML-driven content personalization

Built in 3 hours with focus on clean UX and efficient data filtering
